summary: A female psychologist wants to understand the minds of a confessed serial killer who spent the last five years in a mental hospital because of his state.
cast: Paolo Rotondo|Paul Glover|Chris Graham|Darien Takle|Rebecca Hobbs|Roy Ward|Cath McWhirter|Carolyn Beaver|Caelem Pope|Jennifer Ward-Lealand|Finn Johnsen|Phillip Brown|Tau Luke|Tim Barlow|Sam Wallace|Aaron Buskin|John Steemson|Oliver Hodges|Beth Allen|Chris Bailey|Gary Mackay|Steve Hall|Shane Bessant|Katrina Browne|Yvonne Dudman|Frances Chan|Scott Wills|Jenny Rushton|Matt Cornelius|Hugh D'Calveley|Sara Pivac|Vanessa Byrnes|Jon Brazier|Mike Dwyer|David Baxter
title: The ugly
